articles.title: ESPN 100 recruit Ja'Kobe Walter chooses 'winning history,' will join Baylor men's basketball program
articles.description: Won over by "the winning history under coach (Scott) Drew," five-star rising senior Ja'Kobe Walter announced his commitment to Baylor on Wednesday, two years to the minute that the Bears first extended him a scholarship offer.
articles.content:
Five-star rising senior Ja'Kobe Walter announced his commitment to Baylor on Wednesday, two years to the minute that the Bears first extended him a scholarship offer.

articles.title: Diego Maradona death: Eight doctors, nurses to be tried for homicide in Argentina
articles.description: Eight people who took care of soccer legend Diego Maradona will be tried in Argentina courts for homicide, according to a ruling released Wednesday.

articles.title: Oklahoma Sooners oust Texas A&M Aggies to advance to Men's College World Series finals
articles.description: Oklahoma's David Sandlin overpowered Texas A&M with 12 strikeouts in a 5-1 victory Wednesday to lead the Sooners into the Men's College World Series finals.
articles.content: OMAHA, Neb. -- David Sandlin held Texas A&M to one run and struck out a career-high 12 in seven innings, Jimmy Crooks' three-run homer in the first held up and Oklahoma advanced to the Men's Coll… [+2045 chars]

articles.title: Ex-NFL DT Tony Siragusa, 'The Goose,' dies at age 55
articles.description: Former NFL defensive tackle Tony Siragusa, known during his playing career as "The Goose," has died at age 55.
articles.content:
Former NFL defensive tackle Tony Siragusa, known during his playing career as "The Goose," has died at age 55.

articles.title: PGA Tour commissioner Jay Monahan says LIV Golf Invitational Series is an 'irrational threat' to the game
articles.description: Commissioner Jay Monahan on Wednesday said the PGA Tour "can't compete" with the billions being spent by the LIV Golf Invitational Series, and that the new circuit is an 'irrational threat' to the game's growth.
articles.content:
If there was any doubt about the venom brewing between the PGA Tour and the rival LIV Golf Invitational Series, the latest salvo was delivered by the breakaway circuit on Wednesday.

articles.title: Roger Goodell says he has no 'authority' to remove Daniel Snyder as owner of Washington Commanders
articles.description: Roger Goodell says he has no "authority" to remove Daniel Snyder as owner of the Commanders amid ongoing scrutiny into the organization's workplace culture and accusations of pervasive sexual harassment by team executives of women employees.

articles.title: Baltimore Ravens LB Jaylon Ferguson dies at age 26
articles.description: Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson has died at the age of 26, the team announced. The former third-round pick had played three seasons in Baltimore.
articles.content:
OWINGS MILLS, Md. -- Baltimore Ravens outside linebacker Jaylon Ferguson died at the age of 26, the team announced Wednesday.
No cause of death was given.
